eisenmp_examples.worker package

Submodules

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce module

Example 1 brute force

eisenmp uses a list reducer module in example 2. Generated list rows from language dict are compared with chars.

Vars and Queues stored in the toolbox instance. See documentation for a quick overview, please.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.brute_force(toolbox)

List -> dict str compare until stop order in last list, generator empty.

Params:

worker_msg: test for a valid string

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.remove_header(toolbox)

Transport ticket with consecutive number. Remove if no recreation of order is necessary. Can reuse list for result, if rebuild order.

Use self.header_msg attribute to overwrite default header string

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.search_str(s_str, toolbox)

Write to result Q if str matched.

Params:

s_str: current generated string to test

Params:

multi_tool: here the words dict

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.send_eta_data(toolbox)

list of [PERF_HEADER_ETA, PERF_CURRENT_ETA] to ProcInfo, to calc arrival time ETA

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.send_output(toolbox, str_lst)

Put your findings in the output list. Find results in the ‘eisenmp_utils.Result.result_dict’

Params:

toolbox: -

Params:

average: average of the (chunk of) column

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.tool_get(toolbox)
eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.worker_entrance(toolbox)

  • WORKER - Called in a loop.

Start, Entry, Exit of this single process worker. We return True to get next list chunk, whatever object is in the rows. Fed from mp_input_q to our toolbox. toolbox is our work instance with queues, messages, list chunk, and work tools like language dictionary or hash list.

toolbox.foo, gives also access to all attributes and values of the ‘modConf.foo’ instance, you have created

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_bruteforce.workload_get(toolbox)

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce module

Compare string characteristics with ‘opponent’ str. A timer shows periodically the amount of rows left.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.char_type_count(a_str)

Char count to identify string ‘opponents’ with unequal char count, but same length.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.condense_list_from_mem_replace_spec_char(str_to_comp, word_list)

A list already in mem. Reduce. Replace str chars only for shrink candidates.

Params:

str_to_comp: search str

Params:

word_list: list to shrink with strings only of size str_to_comp

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.list_reduce(toolbox)

Each Process takes only one chunk of the dict/list. Store char type [r, o, y] and count of search string. Compare string characteristics with ‘opponent’ str. Remove a word from list if char not in word or char type count does not match. Keep only matching words in the list.

Params:

str_to_comp: given str to search in wordlists/dict

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.remove_header(toolbox)

Transport ticket with consecutive number. Remove if no recreation of order is necessary. Can reuse list for result, if rebuild order.

Use self.header_msg attribute to overwrite default header string

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.send_output(toolbox, word_list)

Put your findings in the output list. Find results in the ‘eisenmp_utils.Result.result_dict’

Params:

toolbox: -

Params:

average: average of the (chunk of) column

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.timer_show_rows_left(idx, start_time, word_list, toolbox)

Better readable. Show rows left in list.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_bf_reduce.worker_entrance(toolbox)

  • WORKER - Called in a loop.

Start, Entry, Exit of this single process worker. We return True to get next list chunk, whatever object is in the rows. Fed from mp_input_q to our toolbox. toolbox is our work instance with queues, messages, list chunk, and work tools like language dictionary or hash list.

toolbox.foo, gives also access to all attributes and values of the ‘modConf.foo’ instance, you have created

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_csv module

Economy Example CSV column calculation.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_csv.calc_average(toolbox)

Calc average from strings. Pandas can make float, but we use raw Python csv import. Table column has ‘nan’ and empty cells we can not read.

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_double module

Worker of fake production

Output queue list header must be different for audio and video to save results. header_aud and header_vid are pre-defined in ModuleConfiguration

eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_watchdog module

Module for investigation of thread activity. Runs with some examples.

class eisenmp_examples.worker.eisenmp_exa_wrk_watchdog.Color

Bases: object
